partnerSponsorName.label: What is the name of your partner’s sponsor?
partnerSponsorName.required: Enter the name of your partner’s sponsor.
partnerSponsorName.strlen: The name of your partner’s sponsor must be 500 characters or less.
partnerSponsorName.change: Change the name of your partner’s sponsor

partnerHomeOfficeReference.label: What is your partner’s Home Office reference number?
partnerHomeOfficeReference.required: Enter your partner’s Home Office reference number.
partnerHomeOfficeReference.strlen: Your partner’s Home Office reference number must be 500 characters or less.
partnerHomeOfficeReference.change: Change your partner’s Home Office reference number

partnerSponsorshipUndertakingSigned.legend: What date was your partner’s sponsorship undertaking signed?
partnerSponsorshipUndertakingSigned.required: Enter the date that your partner’s sponsorship undertaking was signed.
partnerSponsorshipUndertakingSigned.format: Enter a real date that your partner’s sponsorship undertaking was signed.
partnerSponsorshipUndertakingSigned.change: Change the date your partner’s sponsorship undertaking was signed
